layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x46
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x46
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x30
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 592x30 [border: (3px solid #FF0000)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (3,3) size 586x24
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 586x20
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 582x20 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 580x18
                text run at (1,1) width 377: "This tests the 'style' attribute of TABLE. This table should "
                text run at (377,1) width 204: "have a solid medium red border"
